name: Fate Puzzle: Brain Riddle Game
description:
Welcome to the mysterious and fun world of Fate Puzzle! This game is developed to entertain you and improve your attention skills!

Do you enjoy watching folks get exactly what they deserve? You can choose and give the punishment they deserve in this riddle game! You should choose to determine the path of the deaths of the people!

Fate Puzzle is a new riddle game with various scenarios in it. As you continue to play you will be greeted with a variety of new scenarios that will challenge your way of thinking. You can determine the death patterns of the characters you see in each new level.

This game is to push yourself with mind games and train your brain out. Enjoy these unique, and creative iq games to brainwash! IQ games will blow your brain out and get you thinking outside of the box for the legendary brain test.

Fate Puzzle is the most addictive tricky puzzle game which challenges and tests your mind and iq. There are different tricky riddles in this game, and you have to play the game every day in order to solve these riddles and reach more difficult levels.

A unique experience of these brain teasers awaits you with the riddle games that will twist your mind and puzzle you hard. Mind games and riddle games should be fun for all ages and Fate Puzzle assures you that!

Features of the game:

- Various characters and scenarios
- Imaginative gameplay!
- Beat the challenges at different levels.
- Find solutions to solve riddles!
- Simple and addictive gameplay!
- Fun brain teaser game that will blow your mind!



Fate Puzzle is a wonderful game that you can have mind games, brain games, tricky puzzles and hidden object games. This game with various difficulties will challenge you and test the power of your brain. We guarantee you will have a lot of fun playing!

You will brainstorm with this new brain teaser game. It will blow your mind as you keep playing this amazing game! This new tricky mind game offers you to get to the bottom of the fun!

Fate Puzzle brings you the most original brain challenge! Unique tricky mind puzzles and riddle games guarantee you hours of fun! While enjoying and solving your riddles, challenge and exercise your mind & brain.

Enjoy Fate Puzzle, the new game from Bolga Games dedicated to fun!
publishers: Bolga Games Yazilim Teknoloji ve Oyun Anonim Sirketi
